#summary Ant Build and Deploy

= Introduction =

The BuildKit provides an easy way to build, test and deploy your OSB projects.

= Downloads =

 * [http://code.google.com/p/osbutils/downloads/detail?name=buildkit-0.1.zip&can=2&q= Latest packaged ZIP]

= Source Code =

The source code is available from Google code. The code can either be
[http://code.google.com/p/osbutils/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2FBuildKit browsed online] or, if you would like to contribute, can be accessed with a Subversion client.

= Details =

The BuildKit is based on the following components:

 * An Ant build script
 * OSB configuration JAR is created by invoking Eclipse
 * Deployment of configuration JAR is performed by WLST
